text: aur yaad karo jab tumhaare rab ne pharishton se kaha ki "main dharatee mein (manushy ko) khaleefa (sattaadhaaree) banaanevaala hoon." unhonne kaha, "kya usamen usako rakhega, jo usamen bigaad paida kare aur raktapaat kare aur ham tera gunagaan karate aur tujhe pavitr kahate hain?" usane kaha, "main jaanata hoon jo tum nahin jaanate.
